definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Output storage method is adopted to cancel the offset voltage.
sentences.chinese: 通過輸出存儲的方法消除比較器失調電壓的影響。

sentences.english: Single Supply, High Slew Rate, Low Input Offset Voltage Operational Amplifiers.
sentences.chinese: 單電源，高壓擺率，低輸入失調電壓運算放大器。

sentences.english: Single Supply, High Slew Rate, Input Offset Voltage Operational Amplifiers.
sentences.chinese: 單電源，高壓擺率，輸入失調電壓運算放大器。

sentences.english: Ultra low offset voltage operational amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 超低失調電壓運算放大器。

sentences.english: Low power low offset voltage dual comparator.
sentences.chinese: 低功耗低失調電壓雙比較器。
